red sox won, and to all the yankees fans, free grief counciling here!!!!! just kidding, ya i knew red sox were going to win!!!!!
So do you like the Sox or the Yankees better? They just showed that money can't buy everything. Even $185 million. The Cardinals, best record in regular season, spent $80 million. Go Cards!!!

As a die-hard sox fan, I told every yankee fan in sight (hundreds here in SW CT) that there was no way the sox would go down in four straight. That would not have been interesting! Love 'em or hate 'em, the Red Sox always seem to make it interesting..... Just look at tonight's game (World Series #1). What a see-saw (sp?) battle!! I feel with every cell in my being that the Boston Red Sox will be this year's world champs in five games or less.
 
 P.S. I have seen a lot of dignity (sp?) and grace from my yankee friends in being good sports. :)
